title: Exists and Needs Photo does not response if Location is not available.
body:
**Summary:** 

If the location is not available and user clicks to Exists and Needs Photo chip, it does not respond. In that state, if user clicks those chip it should show a Toast saying " Location not available ".

**Steps to reproduce:** 

- Goto Nearby Fragment without turned on GPS ( If location is not available, You can see a Toast of " Nearby might not work properly, Location not available ")
- Click Exists or Needs Photo
- You can see by clicking those chips nothing happens.

**What did you expect the app to do, and what did you see instead?**

In that state, if user clicks those chip app should let user know " Location not available " by showing a Toast.

**System logs:**

04-07 01:07:53.286 19459-19459/fr.free.nrw.commons.beta D/NearbyParentFragment: Checking permission and perfoming action
04-07 01:07:53.302 19459-19459/fr.free.nrw.commons.beta D/NearbyParentFragmentPre: Presenter updates map and list
04-07 01:07:53.305 19459-19459/fr.free.nrw.commons.beta D/NearbyParentFragmentPre: Skipping update of nearby places as location is unavailable
04-07 01:07:53.329 19459-19459/fr.free.nrw.commons.beta D/NearbyParentFragment: Location service manager added and registered
04-07 01:07:53.332 19459-19459/fr.free.nrw.commons.beta I/Choreographer: Skipped 8 frames!  The application may be doing too much work on its main thread.
04-07 01:07:53.361 19459-19459/fr.free.nrw.commons.beta D/LocationServiceManager: Provider network disabled
04-07 01:07:53.363 19459-19459/fr.free.nrw.commons.beta D/LocationServiceManager: Provider gps disabled`

**Device and Android version:** 

OPPO A57 version 6.0.1 ( API 23 )
 
**Commons app version:** 

App version- 3.0.0-debug-master~d0f895416 

**Screen-shots:** .

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/71203077/113769242-639e0900-973e-11eb-9c44-a589def192f9.mp4

**Would you like to work on the issue?**

YES.
